website_summaries.verdict: The 9.7-inch iPad Pro is the most powerful Apple tablet you can comfortably carry, but it can't replace a traditional laptop or 2-in-1 for the most common business tasks.
pros: Top-notch Pencil stylus and keyboard accessories
cons: iOS apps fall short of Mac and Windows apps in traditional business functionality

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Usually Okay, Not This Time
customer_reviews.text: The iPad arrived with 1000 of someone else's photos still on it. I didn't realize I was buying a refurbished iPad. Still, the price was good, so I deleted the photos and plugged it in to charge. The power cord got really hot and apps started randomly flashing. I returned it the same day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: BusyNebraskaMom

customer_reviews.title: Like the Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Like the Ipad. I was disappointed to find out it was tied to a specific network carrier. Thought I was buying one that I could choose carrier. Have had for months and still haven't set up network so the extra money for that capability has been a waste so far. I checked to see if I had overlooked the information about a specific carrier when I purchased but it wasn't listed. Feel the company that filled the order should have been made the details of their products more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpnjj

customer_reviews.title: Hey, how come in less then 10 days since ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey, how come in less then 10 days since I purchased this IPad Pro and it is already not working. It froze and I can get it to turn back on even after a hard reset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PhotoBooth Solution Higher Profits
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use for photo booth images, works very well. I like it better than my three iPad Pro 12" models because the bracket I use fits these much better for a simple, sturdy tripod mount. I have done away with DSLR photo booth operations and moved into iPads for simplicity, speed, and wifi direct capability with both the Selphy CP1200 printers, and the wonderful Epson PictureMate PM 400. These coupled with my iPads increased profits, and gave customers a great interactive option at parties, events, and business meetings. I've lightened my loads and customers and made nothing but positive comments and re-bookings. The seller was absolutely incredible, very helpful, and one of my best online shopping experiences ever!
customer_reviews.author: JD UT

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: iPad was a genuine Apple product, delivered brand new and as expected. Worked great out of the box, unfortunately 3 days after using it completely stopped working. It wouldn't charge, turn on or reset. This is the reason I am giving it one star. On the positive side, Amazon was great and return was smooth. I have had many Apple products in the past, non of which were dysfunctional. I was too scared to purchase this again and therefore went to the Apple Store because the discount online is only $10 from retail price, despite the advertised large markdown.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sample

customer_reviews.title: Description of product new, can be used.
customer_reviews.text: Product listed as new, the received product had an open, damaged box with smudges and fingerprints on the screen and the new iOS (meaning it had been turned on and updated at least). As such, being a new iPad, the processing speed may have been compromised and battery may have had many cycles. When purchasing a new product rather than used, these are things we hope to avoid and as such the product experience was compromised by inaccurate condition of the product.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: A nice upgrade to the iPad, if you want the ability to use a pencil
customer_reviews.text: After trying to use various "smart" pencils with my iPad Air 2 with little success, I jumped up to the iPad Pro for the ability to use an Apple Pencil for notes, drawings, and photo editing. For everyday use it's just a more expensive iPad, but when you need the extra features it's great. The pencil charges extremely fast directly from the iPad's lighting port, which is awesome. The extra speakers sound nice and really make a difference when watching a movie. The camera is nice, but seriously, who wants to take photos with an iPad? It's good in a pinch, but there are much better and easier to use cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: LindenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 6 month old and wont charge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March and it's August and iPad won't charge. Tried all the you tube tricks with no results!!! Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: J. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: so I was already pretty aware of what I was getting
customer_reviews.text: I am a dedicated Apple customer, so I was already pretty aware of what I was getting, but I have to admit I am still impressed by the continuous improvements Apple makes on it's products and the user friendly approach. I purchased this iPad to take with me to work so I don't have to use my professional computer for personal business. It works perfectly and meets all of my expectations. The package arrived quickly and the product was in original packaging. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a zero I would! We purchased an iPad Pro from this company December 12, 2017 and I got it as a Christmas present. Had to bring it to Apple due to the iPad not powering on properly. It would only show Apple screen then go black when plugged into wall charger. It wouldn’t recognize the device plugged into a computer. While at Apple they informed us that our “warranty” will expire in 5 days because this iPad we thought was brand new was actually purchased back in December 2016 then resold to us.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: I had an iPad mini and while it was easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the iPad Pro 9.7. I had an iPad mini and while it was easy to carry, it was small enough it was somewhat difficult to read text. The 'Pro 9.7' is large enough to overcome that but still easier to carry as compared to larger iPad. An additional feature with this iPad is that unless you are in direct sunlight, it is much easier to read and/or browse the internet outside (my wife and I camp a lot and I use the iPad to go online while outside under the awning).
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, great quality graphics and audio
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid Apple user of all mediums but after just having a baby and trying to work from home as a graphic designer, sometimes my MacBook would just take too long to startup and get going. I needed to upgrade my now obsolete iPad mini (due to the new iOS update that doesn't support my Mini 1) and the iPad Pro was just the ticket. Super fast, great quality graphics and audio, the Apple Pencil is a must (otherwise go for the Air or the new Mini). I'm super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GCustode

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This runs circles around my old dinosaur iPad which I bought used and had for several years until it finally just was no longer fully functional. I am visually impaired and Apple has so many features for my disability that I could not function without my iPad, so I made the plunge and invested in this beauty. I love it. I was afraid I couldn't afford a new one, but this one was well worth diving into the savings. It is lighter and smaller but the screen is the same size, so I can easily slip it into my backpack to go to work, and it is so much faster than the old one. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: 57steps

customer_reviews.title: 5 stares like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like my new iPad just fine, came new in the box just like it said been running great I’m glad I did not go for the new iPad cheaper version of the pro! My last on was cheaper version the 2017 liked it enough, but this 2016 iPad Pro is better the four speakers and the 12 meapekel camera is great! And I like not having the gap on the screen, and I’m content being back to laminated! The senitiete on the screen is better to! Then the iPad 2017 version! So this was a great buy am rather happy. Happy shopping
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Garlinghouse

customer_reviews.title: I did get a good price and so far no complaints on how it ...
customer_reviews.text: This item said new, but I have a feeling that it has been open and repackaged. When you buy directly from Apple every thing is pristine. The box had a dent, the outside wrapping didn't seem authentic, the iPad itself had smudges. This would ever happen if bought at Apple. I did get a good price and so far no complaints on how it is working. But should not be advertised as new if it has been open ..
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Feeling weary? Read this. You'll have no worries :)
customer_reviews.text: Read some negative reviews, that made me iffy in buying. But tried it out myself and came exactly as the offer said, brand new, in the box and serial number worked to register! So yes it's a real iPad. Whoever said that they got a fake one, must of gotten this warehouse mistaken with some place else ware! Definitely will be buying from this seller again, and you guys should too. Awesome iPad, amazing photos, and much more that I didn't even expect from the device. I got the 9.7inch 32 GB one and I'm thoroughly impressed. Best iPad to buy! Don't get the 12inch one if you want an amazing camera because, it doesn't have it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase this from Amazon after reading some of the reviews. I was afraid that it would come looking used or refurbished or not an authentic iPad. It came in its original packaging and it is most indeed a real iPad. If you are ever in doubt you can check the serial number on the Apple website. So I got a brand-new one on Amazon for around the same price most people were asking for a used one on Craiglist or eBay. This is the older model but it will do me just fine. I'm actually not a fan of the newer, larger model.
customer_reviews.author: periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an iPad Pro 9. 7-inch (128GB, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an iPad Pro 9.7-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi, Rose Gold) 2016 Model and I received an IIPAD AIR 2 16GB in a box of an Ipad Pro!!!!! It's a FRAUD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! New Sealed Box
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box with a dead battery. It's a 2016 model and it said last full charge was 6989 hrs back. It changed to 100% in exactly 4 hours. It has had 3-5 hours of use daily for 4 days and is still at 36% never being turned off. Seems good to me. Very happy with it. Check prices carefully. This model and color varied by $50-200 on Amazon. I love the soft gold color. It was less expensive than the others. This is my first iPad and now I almost wish I had gotten the 10.5". However, the 9.7 is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mari B

customer_reviews.title: Best drawing experience
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted an iPad Air 2, and kept trying to draw on it with styluses, and it just never felt right. In fact, it made me feel like I couldn't draw properly. I bit the bullet and decided to buy myself the iPad Pro and an Apple Pencil, and it's INCREDIBLE. It is JUST like drawing with a pencil, from pressure sensitivity to stippling. It feels amazing, and I love that it's portable. I'm drawing a lot more again, and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joan Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad, NO False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I had no experience with Abe's of Maine and was really hesitant to purchase Apple electronics from anywhere except the Apple Store. After researching online buys, the Apple Store and Amazon, I decided to buy through Abe's Electronics on Amazon. What a wonderful experience this has been! My iPad Pro 9.7" tablet arrived quickly, still in the original packaging and BRAND NEW!! (not refurbished or even used). It is exactly what I ordered. The total price of my new 128Gb 9.7" iPad Pro is less than the 128Gb certified refurb I had looked at online at rhe Apple Store. I would definitely recommend Abe's based on my experience and the products they have.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The iPad arrived in an evelope, not a box. Did not come with apple charger or lightening cord. Has several blemishes and dents on the corners. Was not described and used in the product description. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dady

customer_reviews.title: The product is great but the seller is not
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the seller is not. Sold as a new unit but I found that it was not an authentic apple product but was built from parts by someone else and some of the parts were years old. I returned the device because of that NOT because of the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Pro! Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad Pro! Shipping was very good, and fast too. I originally purchased this particular one because I needed the retina display, and the WiFi+Cellular capabilities for my drone. Was pleasantly surprised when I found out that my SIM chip out of my old Android would work flawlessly in the new iPad! I have found that this iPad can do a whole lot more! Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: so not heavy use at all but still the battery runs down very fast which isn't a problem at home but might be a drag when using i
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive skinny iPad compared with the iPad 2 I previously owned. My only complaint is that the battery doesn't hold its charge for nearly as long as the 2 did, I have to charge it up every second day as it discharges down to about 13% with only very moderate use in the evenings as my husband uses it while watching TV to check his emails, play checkers, Soduku etc. so not heavy use at all but still the battery runs down very fast which isn't a problem at home but might be a drag when using it during travel if you can't get to a charging station easily. Otherwise an elegant tablet that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly older, but still perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the size limit for me on tablets. The new 10.5 pro was too large, and too pricey for me, especially since I would have to upgrade to 256gb to get the 128gb that I actually want, and the new 9.7 iPad (2017)is a little weak on the specs. The delivery was very smooth. I received a brand new iPad, and I have to say, I love it. The display, the sound, the camera(s) the ability to add accessories, ( the discount ), made this an easy decision. Compare all options before you buy. This may work for you too
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: The iPad itself isn't bad. However
customer_reviews.text: The iPad itself isn't bad. However, after it happened to me I found out that the power chords often break off inside and renders the iPad useless. This happened to me. I simply was unplugging and it snapped off. I read that this is something that is unable to be repaired but my Assurant coverage has me sending it in to be repaired. I'll have to wait to see what happens but in the meantime it will be over two weeks without a device if Assurant decides to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was very skeptical at first buying apple from amazon. But unfortunately my near apple stores didn't have this 2016 model (9.7). Took a risk and was blown away. Its awesome. The performance is great. Battery takes a little while to charge but its okay with me. Has a great battery life. Got the apple pencil and both go great. I was so happy that it was delivered within 2 days. The screen is pretty big. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Monterville

customer_reviews.title: Severe light bleed from screen edges (new out of box).
customer_reviews.text: Apple fan, but this item had serious screen light bleed from the edges (new out of the box). Purchasing an Apple product is a gamble these days - obviously inconsistent QC, and any attempt to contact Apple results in a form letter reply. Disappointed, but kept the faulty ipad anyway.
customer_reviews.author: GMG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing short of amazing so far! I was a little hesitant to buy this online but knowing it was backed by the highly trusted quality of "amazon fulfilled" I did and have no regrets. I am a self proclaimed "Apple Head" so I'm totally committed to apple products. This iPad Pro is by far nothing short of amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: This vendor misrepresented the item!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift as a new item. In July we were unable to get it to turn on so we finally made an appointment at a Apple store to get it fixed thinking it was under warranty. Well it was not under warranty because it was registered a year earlier. This was supposed to be a new item not a pre owened or refurbished item. Be careful what you buy from this vendor
customer_reviews.author: David Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best iPad I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm going to keep this short and sweet. I bought this to sketch using the Apple Pencil and it is far better than using paper. With layers it brings a whole new level of creativity to drawing or paining. The pencil is truly amazing. The iPad is the best I have used and it comes everywhere with me. The sound is awesome very loud for an iPad and the screen looks amazing. If your on the fence about getting one, just get it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aluzion TV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and awesome price
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought the 9.7 Pro and not the bigger sizes. The screen is exactly the same size as my previous iPad without the bulk. I received my iPad brand new in the sealed box. It was a European version so the only difference was the charger. I already had a couple chargers laying around so that was not a problem. As much as I loved my good ole iPad 2 (it still works and I gave it to my daughter) this model is like having a new laptop. I take this with me everywhere. More than satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Putt

customer_reviews.title: Running three businesses on it with no problems - super tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Great! Great! A year later, it is still sizzling along. I am running a non-profit for stepfamilies, an online mediation/counseling business, and a writing business on it. The writing business involves some graphic design, and LOTS of composition, collecting online articles for research, sneding drafts and revisions to clients, and often sending finals in various versions to print media for clients. Everything works excellently! 100% recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Collins

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Apple Global Service Exchange (GSX):Inquire Model: iPad Pro (9.7-inch) 256GB Gold IMEI: n/a Serial number: DMPSXXXXXXXX Activation status: activated Estimated purchase date: 2018-08-16 End of warranty date: 2019-08-15 Technical support: 2018-11-14 Whether extended warranty: No Whether the official change machine: No Activate lock: close ID black and white: Off Network lock: Unlocked Part Number: MLN12LL/A Product Type: Retail Machine Place of purchase: United States Product seller: Apple Reseller Maintenance status: none Sales code: GR24 Manufacturer: Other Production date: 2016-12-02 Lending equipment: No
customer_reviews.author: Woods hu

customer_reviews.title: I Expected More
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed by this product. It doesn't hold a charge long at all, freezes on me a bit, and the operating system isn't the fastest. The lag is the most annoying part.
customer_reviews.author: Lisan al-Gaib

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little device!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and am very happy with it. My 3 year old iPad bit the dust so I got this one to replace it. Very pleased with the performance so far and have my fingers crossed that it will last a lot longer than my other model.
customer_reviews.author: XENAMITTS

customer_reviews.title: Don't sell stuff that aren't good to your customers
customer_reviews.text: This IPad I use for practically anything, and has it for about 2 months and it stopped working. Wouldn't charge at all. Took it to get it fix to two computer store and they said that the problem is the same as I mentioned. Plus home screen isn't working. It probably better to buy a new IPad because the cost is expensive. Thanks Amazon for selling products that we paid for and now we have to buy another one. We'll I won't be buying anything from your company any longer.
customer_reviews.author: EFREN B.

customer_reviews.title: Love my ipad pro.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered so quickly, I'm not even kidding. The product itself, tho, it got tiny scratches very quickly, I was surprised my ipad mini never got a scratch on it, besides that, great device, Buy a screen protector if you want to avoid scratches, the apple pencil is at fault which is worse I draw a lot but the screen's resilience seems not made for drawing
customer_reviews.author: FernHW

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully this one sailed through setup just fine and installed all my favorite applications in no time ...
customer_reviews.text: My new iPad Pro is everything I hoped for. It’s the second one I purchased. The first one never got through set up before it locked up and would never restore to factory settings so I had to send it back. Thankfully this one sailed through setup just fine and installed all my favorite applications in no time flat. Now I’m enjoying all the cool features and having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great iteration of the iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than my old iPad 3. Same size but much better screen. The speed makes much difference as does the fact that it is not as prone to crashes as the iPad had become. Video recording performance is amazing. I had an old HD video camera that is a joke by comparison. I paired it with this product which is crystal clear and seems to have zero impact on touch screen responsiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf

customer_reviews.title: Angry
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has nothing but a headache for me. It freezes all the time and does a lot of weird stuff. I wish I bought it at a store and not online. It want happen again.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for me, now the wife wants to ditch her old iPad.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the iPad Pro for a month and am still figuring some of it's capabilities out. I have cheap stylus that works well with it. (Not paying the crazy price Apple wants for their electronic stylus gizmo). My wife has the older iPad and now wants the iPad Pro. The speed and response to inputs is quite a difference. The screen makes everything look better. I'll probably end up getting another for the wife.
customer_reviews.author: PaulnBama

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - you’ll love it and won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have had this for almost three years now, and while I recently upgraded to the new 12.9 inch iPad Pro for the increase in features and screen size this still works extremely well and has gotten me through almost 500 flights across the years. Would 100% recommend for frequently travelers looking to portable media solutions, or anyone supplementing/replacing their current laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C.

customer_reviews.title: Its an apple, why settle for less
customer_reviews.text: Tablet functions as it should, its an apple. Anything less that optimal performance is a disappointment. This is a replacement to my ipad 2 that was purchased in 2011. After weeks of deciding between this and the ipad air 2 I deemed it a waste to buy the air2 when this is spec'd at 2x the performance of the A2. The way apple throws updates out its only a matter of time before the A2 is obsolete and slows down as my iPad 2 did.
customer_reviews.author: Ben DeFelice

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, only problem is that it did not come ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, only problem is that it did not come with the cable to charge it. Without the cable this cannot be charged and if can't be charged, it can't be used. Very disappointing considering the cost, one would think all the required pieces to use this would have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used iPad Pro 9.7 was as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought an "almost new" iPad Pro 9.7. It was as described. When it arrived it had a stocking sticker on it that said "A-" on it, I assume that was the evaluated condition. I could not find any imperfections on the screen or body of the device. My only concern was that the device battery was completely dead on arrival, but after a week or so of use now it appears to be fine. It must have been a display model or something.
customer_reviews.author: Probs1

customer_reviews.title: Only $689.00.....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding....sealed brand new in box as listed by seller....my other iPad was 1st generation, Dec 2010.......no camera snail slow compared to this iPad Pro.....still learning all that this one will do and learning to use Apple Pencil....would have cost $749.00 + tax or more than $800.00 at the Apple Store in Gilbert, AZ....I am extremely pleased with my purchase.....
customer_reviews.author: James E. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: ... am please with this APPLE product and working just fine..
customer_reviews.text: I am please with this APPLE product and working just fine... The Photo is incredible sharp image... Is better then iPad 2, iPad 3... The quality is solid and SUPERB! I am using this as just for Photo only. Can't get better then this....
customer_reviews.author: Kestutis

customer_reviews.title: Great ipad pro!
customer_reviews.text: Great ipad pro. It was an easy set up. It matches my iphone 7 plus perfectly. I haven't used it much but plan on taking it on a long trip so will use it then. The picture is beautiful on it and look forward to exploring all of the things it is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: coribeth2

customer_reviews.title: The Four Speakers are the WOW Factor!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I LOVE the four speakers! If you're encountering issues hearing from your current iPad with one speaker (as I did), this is the iPad to buy. Sound quality is excellent and worth the extra you'll be paying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindness Matters

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love! And I want to tell the whole world!
customer_reviews.text: As described, on time, perfect! Just like the Apple store, only cheaper! Exact same model as the latest on the Apple store. No tax! Awesome! Prime shipping! Awesome again! And a great product. Love the fingerprint sign on. I love the 4 speakers. I love the smaller size and lighter weight compared to the older Air 2. I love the speed of this thing, with the newer processor. There's so much to love...I am in love. You will be too! Stop reading this and just buy the darn thing already!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I have ever owned. The only issue is that it is problematic to bulk delete emails. It takes a work around to accomplish what should be easy.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Received an iPad Air 2 in a iPad Pro box.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Amazons bad titling and handling.
customer_reviews.text: The box wasn't in factory packaging, the apple stickers were missing out of the box which was slightly alarming, and the box was significantly damaged when it arrived(dents and great damage to corners). The iPad seemed slower than I've seen online and at Apple Stores which may have a little to do with my wifi. THIS IS A REAL IPAD FOR THOSE WONDERING.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Pro 9.7
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite gadgets. I'm not an apple fanboy but i really like how the tablet and pen mesh. I mainly use this to consume media, draw, and take notes at school. Previously I had a surface pro 3 but the pen wasn't working as well as I'd like. then I tried out the ipad pro w apple pencil and I am finally happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great usage experience
customer_reviews.text: The price is appealing compared with that on the apple official website. I like the gold color and a tablet in support of writing notes as well as drawing in PDF is in great demand. I'm pleased with the product because it can cooperate wonderfully with Apple Pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Apple products we bought
customer_reviews.text: I have been disappointed by many Apple products over the years (faulty screens and keyboards on my Macbook Pro, terrible battery life on iPhones and previous iPads). This one, however, has survived three years and works just as well as in the first day. Slightly pricey for a table, but at least we never had to fix anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I are now going to convert to iphones after we both have loved using this ipad
customer_reviews.text: I came from a full Windows environment, and have used some Windows pads in the past, but this ipad is in a league of its own! I use it with Onsong for lyrics and chords at gigs, and it's set up on my desk (on an OMOTON iPad Pro Stand) and is in constant use. My wife and I are now going to convert to iphones after we both have loved using this ipad.
customer_reviews.author: SwordWord

customer_reviews.title: Power Gobbler!
customer_reviews.text: Light and bright with a lot of neat features, but consumes power much faster than the iPad I upgraded from! Could be that the battery is inadequate, but whatever it is, if you buy one stay close to a power source!
customer_reviews.author: BluJay

customer_reviews.title: I got an Europe version iPad Pro and the charger ...
customer_reviews.text: I got an Europe version iPad Pro and the charger inside the Apple official package can not be used in US. *update: I got feedback from the seller and was told that there’s a US charger outside of the apple official package. I am sorry I did not find the charger when I post this. However, I suppose this means that the product is an European package version? It works ok till now but I think it would be better if the version has been mentioned in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Man-Ning C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Only had it two days, but so far so good. Faster, brighter, better than my old iPad mini (first gen)
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love my iPad
customer_reviews.text: I love my iPad Pro. It is so much faster than my iPad to which I had to stop upgrading apps because the operating system could no longer support the newer versions. Now I can grade in complete confidence.
customer_reviews.author: slcartwright

customer_reviews.title: A Compact Power House.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when I first received it and thought about returning it. The reason was that it does not seem to be any faster than my iPad Air (version 1). I decided not to return it and have loaded it up with apps. The artistic apps are very interesting. I will grow into it. It will be heavily used in the fall when I return to school as a volunteer working with fourth through seventh graders. The potential is just about unlimited.
customer_reviews.author: HLA

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought it for our daughter for Christmas. She loves it. It's your typical Apple quality product, Very nice fit and finish. Very quick and great quality screen. We looked at the regular non-pro version but after reading the differences, we decided to splurge and get the pro.
customer_reviews.author: Sig Al

customer_reviews.title: Love my IPAD Pro 9.7!
customer_reviews.text: IPad Pro 9.7 was very easy to transfer everything from my old IPad to this one through ICloud. I received it a day earlier than I was expecting, which was nice. Since it is so slim I bought a good screen protector and case for it. Recommended it to my sister so she bought one too. I like the extra security this IPad has. I bought this as I needed a bigger hard drive. My old IPad was one of the first ones to come out. So an updated one was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Spirit

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry I swapped my iPad Air for the Pro
customer_reviews.text: Swapped my iPad Air for the Pro. I bought the device for more memory, keyboard connection ability and better sound. Have rebooted the Pro a number of times because it locks up during use. Gorilla Glass 3 picks up every finger print and dust particle. I MISS MY IPAD AIR!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: I needed a slip-in the purse size computer that still did everything I needed. I'm happy with how everything synced so nicely and took such little time to set up. I'd considered the bigger size, but am glad I didn't purchase. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DeanOfDreams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: my first Ipad.. use it for music in choir and band.. works great.. battery life is impressive..
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have always had iPhones but never an Apple computer product. In the past I've had the Microsoft Surface tablet. But it died on me. I decided to just spend the money for something that is going to last me. I am really happy with my purchase. My iPad came in a day & came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria R.

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad the best.
customer_reviews.text: iPad Pro was as good as I thought it would be so far. Apple products are the best. This is my 3rd IPad. I use one daily for everything. It definitely fits my lifestyle. Good product. Was also a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: jean Massey

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without an iPad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since Apple pulled a dirty trick on all of us loyal iPad 2 users by discontinuing updates on iPads with 30 pin connectors. (I'm sill angry about that kind of planned obsolescence.) But, I love this new iPad. The size of the useable screen is the same as my old iPad, but the overall size is smaller and much lighter. I am happy with this new iPad Pro 9.7", and hope it lasts as long as my old iPad 2. And, the rose gold color suits me.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: iPad good/charger not so much
customer_reviews.text: The ipad itself works great. The only problem is the charger will not do the one thing it's made to do. That would be charge. I took it to the Apple store. They said "it appears this is an after market charger/cable. So I had to buy a new one. I will test and leave a comment later. iPad itself: great 5 stars. Charger: 0 stars. It works better when it's charged.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A fine product.
customer_reviews.text: I select iPad Pro 9.7" because I want to use Excel without having to pay monthly. I have Excel 2011 in MacBook Air. So it works well for me. I have no complain about this product. It serves my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wen

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a mother's day gift for my mom this year. She loves it! I was pleased with the packaging and delivery. The ipad pro is true quality and it's size is a perfect in between from the larger and mini versions. Have had no issues with the device what so ever and I am very pleased with this purchase. Made momma happy ^_^
customer_reviews.author: R. Melville

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my aunt and she loves it. There was an issue with the charging cable and the seller was soo awesome, they sent us 2 replacement charging cables. My aunt is so happy with this iPad. And we got it super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a new iPad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I was getting a new iPad. It wasn’t new. The charge cable was held together with a rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, no dents or scratches at all.
customer_reviews.text: The iPad came pretty quickly, and I was anxious about the quality of the product. But in reality, the iPad looked and felt brand new, absolutely no scratches. I was surprised, and so relieved. I got a great deal on this product, and should of bought it earlier. The only thing that confused me was that there was no charger or cable included, which I understand other customers received, although I read that it wasn’t that good of a charger. Overall, very satisfied and relieved it is fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The latest version of the ipad and I love it. Got the 256GB model so I will ...
customer_reviews.text: The latest version of the ipad and I love it. Got the 256GB model so I will never run out of storage. easy to carry, handle, and love the rose gold finish. Would defiinitely recommend this to anyone looking for a top of the line ipad....
customer_reviews.author: Don't Worry, Bee Happy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Authentic Apple iPad Pro 9.7.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the iPad mini 4 first but upgraded to this fantastic iPad Pro 9.7 and I love it. Shipping was on time, packaged well and it’s an authentic Apple iPad Pro 9.7. I love the lightweight thin profile and it functions perfectly. I bought the compatible yellow top and bottom case.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: It will help you with your studies and can make study fun.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can write on it with the Apple pen which is the reason I wanted this iPad. I can do a lot of operations on it.That you can write notes on the same article you are reading.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mary Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cellular but not Verizon, what???
customer_reviews.text: No where did it say the cellular would only work with AT&A. Attempted to get technical help 3 times and after being on hold for several minutes the line would disconnect. Frustrating and a waste of my time. I have to return it since I have Verizon. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Wysatta

customer_reviews.title: Premium product
customer_reviews.text: As a long time android user (still use an android phone) Im no Apple fanboy. This is my first apple tablet and its a joy to use. Navigating ios is smooth. The picture and sound quality is amazing. Battery life is better than I expected. The apple pencil is icing on the cake, even if it is a tad expensive its worth every penny. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a premium tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This has make a wonderful replacement for an older netbook, and offers a lot of functionality for such a small device. My husband is an artist and he uses this to sketch, surf the net and watch ESPN wherever/whenever. It's portable, works flawlessly and has a vibrant UHD touchscreen. We use it with a Logitech Create backlit iPad Pro keyboard case, which is equally great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loganbill

customer_reviews.title: Love this 🍏! 🙂
customer_reviews.text: My first iPad Pro, and loving it! If you’re an Apple lover this can be a good addition to your collection. I use it very often to watch Netflix, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Pitintetest, etc. Get a cover, it will keep your iPad good for longer time. 💛
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something as powerful and fast as the iPad Pro, but didn't want the original humongous display size. Ended up getting this 9.7 inch one for my mom and she has been using it since. Everything runs smoothly. A huge upgrade from her own iPad Air.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTeeReviews

customer_reviews.title: Love my ipad
customer_reviews.text: Received my first iPad and couldn’t be more happier. After the initial setup I was good to go, the 9.7 inch screen is just the right size to do what’s necessary... very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product as usual but.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an iPad Air and although I'm very pleased with it I don't really see a great deal of difference. The battery seems to have about half as much use time as the air. The one plus was the ability to use a non blue tooth keyboard made by apple. I wish I had waited until someone else came out with one that is compatible. The one made by apple is unsteady when set up an easily come unhooked from the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ... use this as a computer and it has been amazing! It's simplified my drawing abilities and I've found ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a computer and it has been amazing! It's simplified my drawing abilities and I've found that the programs I can use off of it are compareable to using a full computer and tablet for drawing. It take a bit more time because it's not a full system but I can turn the tablet like paper and that is a huge advantage!
customer_reviews.author: Athena Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Love my iPad Pro!
customer_reviews.text: Love my iPad Pro! Especially great for travel when you don’t want to bring a big laptop, or want to use it as an e-reader.
customer_reviews.author: aliok63

customer_reviews.title: Flagship iPad model (Pro) in a comfortable size..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice in the iPad family for a grade school kid.. It does everything they would need for school.. Apple Pencil Support, surround sound (4speakers), Flashlight, Smart Connector Support etc.. What more can you ask for?? There are newer iPad model for “cheaper” prices but THIS IS THE PRO MODEL IN 9.7inch. Perfect match of functionality and compact form factor..
customer_reviews.author: Jabar Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, large, fast working
customer_reviews.text: My iPad came about a month before writing this review. I love my iPad. It really smooth and works well. My moms iPad is older and keeps glitching but I have had no problems. I'm still getting used to the Apple software because I have a Samsung phone but I'm getting along. The camera is amazing and I love taking pictures. There are live pictures which means that they move a little when take the picture. I can do my virtual academy classes on here and take notes for class. I'm actually writing this on here right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an older version of an IPad mini and the extra screen size is perfect and the crispness of the screen is stunning. However, I would caution anyone with small hands and trying to use thumbs to type. I have fairly long fingers and I'm stretching a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded from iPad 3rd/4th Generation and I love how fast this iPad Pro 9
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from iPad 3rd/4th Generation and I love how fast this iPad Pro 9.7" runs. The display is beautiful and clear. And the battery life is great. I also purchased the Apple Pen and I love it paired with this device. One minor thing I would change is the touch ID - after scanning your finger, you still need to push the home button to unlock. Other than that, I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Sirine

customer_reviews.title: great, fast, high res screen, high res cameras front and back, much thinner than my previous old ipad
customer_reviews.text: this device is great, fast, high res screen, high res cameras front and back, much thinner than my previous old ipad, and a lot more memory! i love it, very happy, no longer i will run out of memory for my updates, nor will i need to delete apps and music to make space for content...
customer_reviews.author: T. Vilaca

customer_reviews.title: Blah, expensive gadget
customer_reviews.text: heavy clunky. just another ipad. retina but video grainy. pencil is hard tip give loud tapping noise on glass and does not feel like real pencil. cumbersome to carry arround with no place to store it. 4 speakers does sounds great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is really good. You can also buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: It is really good. You can also buy with confidence. Where is it? It's Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LEE BYEONG JIN

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the iPads for a while. I use them for flying airplanes, emails and almost everything. The light weight and portability are great, this upgrade is an incredible device. I also purchased the companion keyboard and recommend the combination. It's a great improvement over my old iPad and a good companion to my mini iPad and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Mclendon

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Big and Not Too Small but Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my attached scanner and works beautifully. Updated Os, great camera and ready to roll. Battery life is great, weight is not too heavy. I bought a nice case to go with it to protect the screen and adapter as well as cords.
customer_reviews.author: chiefarchitect

customer_reviews.title: Love, love my new iPad Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a huge Apple fan since my first computer. This is my 3rd iPad, and really like it a lot. I wasn't sure whether to get this size or the bigger one, but opted for this one. Also got the Apple Smart Keyboard, as I have never liked typing on the glass, and so far like it as well. Service was great, and promptly received when ordered.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mcclain

product_meta.title: Apple 9.7-Inch iPad Pro Wi-Fi, 9.7" Tablet, 32 GB, Space Gray (MLMN2LL/A)

Four speaker audio: no matter how you turn it, you'll want to turn it up
ATX chip: faster than a speeding laptop
Insight and FaceTime HD cameras: capture every Detail in greater Detail
Design: incredible power has never been so easy to handle
